output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = here::here())
library(tidyverse)
library(brms)
```

```{r data}
en_jaw <- read_csv("english-jaw/en-jaw.csv")
```

```{r}
priors <- c(
  prior(normal(0, 50), class = Intercept),
  prior(normal(0, 10), class = b)
)

jaw_1 <- brm(
  mean | se(sd) ~
    height *
    atr *
    position,
  data = en_jaw,
  prior = priors,
  cores = 4
)
```

```{r}
summary(jaw_1)
```

```{r}
priors <- c(
  prior(normal(0, 10), class = Intercept),
  prior(normal(0, 2), class = b)
)

jaw_2 <- brm(
  mean | se(sd) ~
    height *
    atr *
    position,
  data = en_jaw,
  prior = priors,
  cores = 4
)
```
